description: This file defines build steps, dependencies, and setup for the 'go-crosssdk' package in a Yocto Project build environment. It includes functions for configuring, compiling, installing, and creating wrappers for the SDK components.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Builds the Go SDK using the make.bash script, setting cross-compiler environment variables.

methods.name: make_wrapper
methods.description: Creates wrapper scripts for Go tools, setting environment variables for cross-compilation.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the built SDK and creates necessary wrapper scripts for toolchain binaries.
